Pittsburgh won by shutout for the 12th time this season.
The Reds lost by shutout for the 14th time this season and for the second time when Skenes started.
The Pirates' bullpen pitched a shutout in a challenging ballpark.
Hunter Greene returned from the injured list but only pitched three innings.
The game was held at Great American Ball Park in Cincinnati, Ohio with an attendance of 34,750.
The game lasted 2 hours and 25 minutes.
